fieldUpdates.name: Contract Request - clear Hold See Notes
Contract Request - clear Sent to Cust
Contract Request - clear Signed by QC

fieldUpdates.description: Assign ownership of the Contract Request to the Contracts Queue
fieldUpdates.name: Contract Request owner - Contracts Queue
Contract Request - set CR Pending status

rules.fullName: Contract Request - Contract Signed by Customer
rules.description: The contract has been returned signed by the customer.

rules.fullName: Contract Request - FRA Sent or Received
rules.description: Email alerts for FleetRisk Advisor contract requests Contract Sent to Customer and Contract Received.
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId ="01250000000QcVq", OR( ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Contract Sent to Customer"), ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c,"Contract Received - QC Signature Pending")), ISCHANGED( Request_Status__c ))

rules.fullName: Contract Request - FRA Set Up Complete
rules.description: Email alerts for FleetRisk Advisor contract requests - Set up Complete
rules.formula: AND( RecordTypeId ="01250000000QcVq", OR( ISPICKVAL(Request_Status__c, "Set-up Complete")), ISCHANGED( Request_Status__c ))

rules.description: The contract status has changed - pending NMC setup
Reset request date fields when a request is cloned.
Reset additional request date fields when a request is cloned.

rules.fullName: Contract Request - Send Notification for Master Test Agreement CR
rules.description: Send an additional email to a specified user on for Master Test Agreement.
Contract Request status changed to "Sent to Customer"
The contract status has changed - it has been fully approved and signed.
A submitted request that is already assigned to a Contract Admin user.
Triggers approval reminders at 7, 14 and 21 days

rules.fullName: Contract Request Credit Approval Hold Reminder
rules.description: Triggers approval reminders if the CR is on hold for more than 24 hours.
Used to notify users when a Contract Request has been in the Pending status for more than 1 day
The date the contract request went into Distributed
The date the contract request went into a waiting on financial hold

rules.fullName: Contract Request waiting Hold%3A Needs Approval
rules.description: The date the contract request went into Hold: Needs Approval

rules.fullName: Contract Request waiting Hold%3A See Notes
rules.description: The date the contract request went into Hold: See Notes
The date the contract request went into Set-up Complete
When a contract is requested in Salesforce through a Contract Request, there is a field called ‘Eval Conversion’ (yes/no) which is used to specify if the customer has eval units to be converted.
Updates field to ensure all workflows fire during approval processes
